radiographic_examinations.findings: Osteolytic lesion in the right 1st rib and a fracture in the right 2nd rib.
Suspicious leakage and web-like lymphatic channels around the right lower neck and subclavian vein; prominent lymphatic channels in the right upper hemithorax.
Increased FDG uptake in the right 1st and 2nd ribs (maximal standardized uptake value = 4.0).
A newly developed osteolytic lesion in the right scapula, suggesting a pathological fracture.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Development of a new lesion compared to earlier imaging.
